categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope actors

nodes.text: Alfie Curtis (July 28, 1930–November 30, 2017) was an actor from Stepney, London. He portrayed Dr. Cornelius Evazan in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope.
Alfie is credited by John Mollo as portraying a 'grubby human' in Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope as documented in the 1979 book The Art of Star Wars.
